hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
SELECT DISTINCT RATE.EORE_NO, RATE.EORE_RATE_CN, RATE.EORE_RATE_EN, RATE.EORE_RP_FLAG_CODE, RATE.EORE_RP_FLAG_NAME, RATE.EORE_EFFECTIVE_DATE, RATE.EORE_EXPIRATION_DATE, RATE.EORE_AUDIT_STATUS_CODE, RATE.EORE_AUDIT_STATUS_NAME, RATE.EORE_RATE_TYPE, RATE.EORE_PARTY_TYPE_CODE, RATE.EORE_PARTY_TYPE_NAME, RATE.EORE_PARTY_CODE, RATE.EORE_PARTY_NAME, RATE.EORE_PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE, RATE.EORE_DISCOUNT_TYPE, RATE.EORE_MINIMUM_FEE, RATE.EORE_MAXIMUM_FEE, RATE.EORE_AUDIT, RATE.EORE_AUDIT_TIME, RATE.EORE_AUDIT_REMARD,
RATE.EORE_ID, RATE.CREATOR, RATE.CREATE_TIME, RATE.MODIFIER, RATE.MODIFY_TIME, RATE.REC_VER, RATE.REC_STATUS, RATE.ORG_ID, RATE.EORE_TRANSPORT_TYPE_CODE, RATE.EORE_DISCOUNT_VALUE, RATE.EORE_REMARK
FROM EO_RATE RATE LEFT JOIN EO_RATE_FEE FEE ON RATE.EORE_NO = FEE.EORF_EORE_NO AND FEE.ORG_ID = RATE.ORG_ID WHERE 1=1
<< AND RATE.EORE_PARTY_TYPE_CODE LIKE :eorePartyTypeCode>> << AND RATE.EORE_DISCOUNT_VALUE LIKE :eoreDiscountValue>>
<<AND RATE.ORG_ID =:orgId>> <<AND RATE.EORE_NO like :eoreNo>> <<AND RATE.EORE_RATE_CN like :eoreRateCn>> <<AND RATE.EORE_RATE_EN like :eoreRateEn>> <<AND RATE.EORE_RP_FLAG_CODE LIKE :eoreRpFlagCode>> <<AND RATE.EORE_RP_FLAG_NAME LIKE :eoreRpFlagName>> <<AND RATE.EORE_AUDIT_STATUS_CODE LIKE :eoreAuditStatusCode>> <<AND RATE.EORE_AUDIT_STATUS_NAME LIKE :eoreAuditStatusName>> <<AND RATE.EORE_TRANSPORT_TYPE_CODE LIKE :eoreTransportTypeCode>> <<AND RATE.EORE_RATE_TYPE LIKE :eoreRateType>> <<AND RATE.EORE_PARTY_TYPE_NAME LIKE :eorePartyName>> <<AND RATE.EORE_PARTY_CODE LIKE :eorePartyCode>> <<AND RATE.EORE_PARTY_NAME LIKE :eorePartyName>> <<AND RATE.EORE_PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE LIKE :eorePaymentTypeCode>> <<AND RATE.EORE_EFFECTIVE_DATE>=:eoreEffectiveFm>> <<AND RATE.EORE_EFFECTIVE_DATE<=:eoreEffectiveTo>> <<AND RATE.EORE_EXPIRATION_DATE>=:eoreExpirationDateFm>> <<AND RATE.EORE_EXPIRATION_DATE<=:eoreExpirationDateTo>> <<AND RATE.EORE_DISCOUNT_TYPE LIKE :eoreDiscountType>> <<AND RATE.EORE_MINIMUM_FEE LIKE :eoreMinMum>> <<AND RATE.EORE_MAXIMUM_FEE LIKE :eoreMaxMum>>
<<AND FEE.EORF_FEE_CODE LIKE :eorfFeeCode>> <<AND FEE.EORF_FEE_NAME LIKE :eorfFeeName>> <<AND FEE.EORF_FEE_TYPE LIKE :eorfFeeType>> <<AND FEE.EORF_FEE_WAY LIKE :eorfFeeWay>> <<AND FEE.EORF_FEE_FORMULA LIKE :eorfFeeFormula>> <<AND FEE.EORF_UNIT_PRICE LIKE :eorfUnitPrice>> <<AND FEE.EORF_MINIMUM_FEE LIKE :eorfMinimumFee>> <<AND FEE.EORF_MAXIMUM_FEE LIKE :eorfMaxiMumFee>> <<AND FEE.EORF_ROUNDING_MODE LIKE :eorfRoundingMode>> <<AND FEE.EORF_SHIPPER_REGION_GRADE LIKE :eorfShipperRegionGrade>> <<AND FEE.EORF_SHIPPER_REGION_CODE LIKE :eorfShipperRegionCode>> <<AND FEE.EORF_SHIPPER_REGION_NAME LIKE :eorfShipperRegionName>> <<AND FEE.EORF_CONSIGNEE_REGION_GRADE LIKE :eorfConsigneeRegionGrade>> <<AND FEE.EORF_CONSIGNEE_REGION_CODE LIKE :eorfConsigneeRegionCode>> <<AND FEE.EORF_CONSIGNEE_REGION_NAME LIKE :eorfConsigneeRegionName>>
